response.overview: "The story of the making of Woodface is about brothers - the good and the bad, and what happens when you tinker with a band's chemistry. Neil and Tim Finn and fellow Crowded House bass player Nick Seymour discuss the highs and lows of the year it took to make Woodface. Along the way, Neil Finn revisits the master tapes, uncovering secrets that have laid hidden for a decade. He also spontaneously performs a number of Woodface songs exclusively for this documentary. Other interviews include Jimmy Barnes, Rob Hirst (Midnight Oil), Reg Mombassa and Pete O'Doherty (Mental as Anything). The DVD contains extended interviews with Neil Finn and Nick Seymour."
response.title: Crowded House: Woodface
